attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people in this country feel that it is undemocratic to have a Prime Minister appointed "through the back door." A coronation is not the correct method. If someone wishes to become Prime Minister, they should stand for election in the time honoured fashion! Therefore, an immediate General Election is essential.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
